attributes.title: Happiness Versus Bliss - Which Is Real?
attributes.description:
09 May 2020

*PARAMASHIVAâ€™S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:

*HAPPINESS IS DELUSION. BLISS IS REAL EXISTENCE.

*WHOEVER ASKS YOU TO PURSUE HAPPINESS IS DELUDING YOU. HAPPINESS IS BINARY LOGIC BASED. TODAY HAPPINESS IS GETTING A CAR. TOMORROW HAPPINESS IS GETTING A HOUSE. DAY AFTER TOMORROW HAPPINESS IS GETTING A WIFE. AND THE NEXT DAY YOU KNOW WHAT IS HAPPINESS! HAPPINESS IS THE WORD SOCIETY, MASS MEDIA CULT AND ENTERTAINMENT INDUSTRY CULT IS USING TO EXPLOIT YOU AND KEEP YOU IN DELUSION CONTINUOUSLY.

*BLISS IS COSMOLOGICAL REALITY. HAPPINESS IS SOCIETAL DELUSION.

*BLISS COMES FROM POWERFUL COGNITIONS. HAPPINESS COMES FROM THE OPINIONS OF THE PEOPLE WHO MAKE YOU POWERLESS AND THOSE POWERLESS COGNITIONS.

*EACH TIME WHEN YOU COGNISE POWERFUL COGNITIONS FROM THE COSMOLOGICAL TRUTHS, TRUTHS AS PER COSMIC LOGIC, YOU MANIFEST BLISS. BLISS IS BASED ON COSMIC LOGIC. HAPPINESS IS BASED ON BINARY LOGIC.

*SOCIETY KEEPS YOU DELUDED WITH THE IDEA OF HAPPINESS. IT IS TOO EASY TO START EXPERIENCING BLISS. IT IS NOT AT ALL DIFFICULT. THAT IS THE FIRST POWERFUL COGNITION YOU NEED TO KNOW: BLISS IS TOO EASY TO EXPERIENCE. THAT IS WHY SOCIETY DOESN'T WANT YOU TO EXPERIENCE BLISS, BECAUSE IT LIBERATES YOU AND MAKES YOU INDEPENDENT OF EXPLOITATIVE GRID-BASED LIFESTYLE.

*BLISS IS THE SOURCE MATERIAL OUT OF WHICH PARAMASHIVA IS MADE, OUT OF WHICH THIS WHOLE UNIVERSE IS MADE.

Read More at: www.facebook.com/ParamahamsaNithyananda/posts/3854021378019017
